verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, When thou <S%H5927>lightest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> shall give <S%H215>light<s%> over <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> he <S%H5927>lighted<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof over <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> was of <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3409>shaft<s%> thereof, <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H6525>flowers<s%> thereof, was beaten <S%H4749>work:<s%> according unto the <S%H4758>pattern<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them.

And <S%H3541>thus<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them: <S%H5137>Sprinkle<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H2403>purifying<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and let them <S%H5674>shave<s%> <S%H8593><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and so make themselves <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

Then let them <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> with his meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> even fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6950>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>assembly<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> together:

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5130>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for an <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>execute<s%> <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullocks:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5130>offer<s%> them for an <S%H8573>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus shalt thou <S%H914>separate<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> mine.

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%> shall the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> to do the <S%H5647>service<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them, and <S%H5130>offer<s%> them for an <S%H8573>offering.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are wholly <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H5414><s%> unto me from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> such as <S%H6363>open<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7358>womb,<s%> even instead of the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken<s%> them unto me.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are mine, both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast:<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them for myself.
And I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as a <S%H5414>gift<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> that there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5063>plague<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> unto them.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H2398>purified,<s%> and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H899>clothes;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>offered<s%> them as an <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> them to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them.

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%> went the Levites <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3881><s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> they unto them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is it <S%H834>that<s%> belongeth unto the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> to wait <S%H6633>upon<s%> <S%H6635><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And from the <S%H4480>age<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall cease waiting <S%H7725>upon<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6635><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof, and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more: <S%H5750><s%>

But shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge,<s%> and shall <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5656>service.<s%> <S%H3602>Thus<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> touching their <S%H4931>charge.<s%>
